name: Tower Of Highfall
description:
----------CONTROLS----------

Left mouse - click: Control direction - release: Jump

R: Restart game

Numbers 1-5: Spawn on selected level (you cheater)

-----------------------------------

Welcome to the Tower of Highfall! 

Your are a little slime and your goal is to reach the... well... goal.
But this is easier said than done! You have to jump all the way to the top of the tower... and you can only jump again if you touched slime on the walls! So be careful on how you want to jump, or else your fall will be painful...
